attributes.action: Stop The Planned £2 Lottery Ticket Plans
attributes.additional_details:
With the planned price increase of the National Lottery's game Lotto going from £1 to £2 in Autumn 2013, this petition is calling on the Government to review Camelot’s licence and call on them to scrap the price increase.

The UK is currently in recession and the price increase will be a further burden for poor people and leave many spending double to play their Lotto Numbers each week.

This is money some people cannot afford.

Camelot cannot get away with this and we need your signature now.
